# Pixora AI - E-commerce Image Optimization

## Overview
Pixora AI is an automated SEO tool for e-commerce sellers. It uses computer vision and LLMs to generate optimized metadata from product images.

## Core Capabilities
- **Visual Analysis**: Detects material, color, style, and category from image pixels.
- **Platform Optimization**:
  - **Shopify**: Generates handles, alt text, and structured metafields.
  - **Etsy**: Generates exactly 13 tags matching the search algorithm.
  - **Amazon**: Generates A9-optimized titles and bullet points.
- **Batch Processing**: Handles 50+ images in a single session.

## Usage
Users upload images -> System analyzes via Gemini 3 Vision -> User downloads CSV.

## Pricing
Free tier available (50 images/month). No credit card required.
